metadata.title: CVE-2024-27406 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:lib/Kconfig.debug: TEST_IOV_ITER depends on MMUTrying to run the iov_iter unit test on a nommu system such as the qemukc705-nommu emulation results in a crash.    KTAP version 1    # Subtest: iov_iter    # module: kunit_iov_iter    1..9BUG: failure at mm/nommu.c:318/vmap()!Kernel panic - not syncing: BUG!The test calls vmap() directly, but vmap() is not supported on nommusystems, causing the crash.  TEST_IOV_ITER therefore needs to depend onMMU.
